item.title: About
item.description: Download my CV if you are interesetd. I have completed my MSc program on statistcs September 2021, and since then have been working at Japanese think tank as researcher. I’m interested in the application of statistical modeling/machine learning for the improvement of digital twin techinologies. Specifically, Reduced Order Modeling Probabilistic Graphical Modeling Reinforcement Learning Gaussian Process :wq
